summary: Use this call to delete a product item
description: Use this call to delete a product item.

query.name: item_id
query.description: ID of item

query.name: tier_variation
query.description: Tier variation info list: If you define a one tier structure, the maximum number of options cannot exceed 100. If you define a two tier structure, the number of options multiplied by the two tiers cannot exceed 100. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

query.name: name
query.description: Tier variation name

query.name: option_list
query.description: Tier variation option info list

query.name: option
query.description: Option name

query.name: image
query.description: Option image

query.name: image_id
query.description: ID of image. You can choose to define or not define the option image. If you choose to define, you can only define an image for the first tier, and you need to define an image for all options of the first tier

query.name: model
query.description: Model info list, model number at most 50

query.name: tier_index
query.description: Tier index of this model. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

query.name: original_price
query.description: Original price of this model. For CO local VAT responsible seller：Please remember the price you set in here must be VAT inclusive. If you have any doubts on how to calculate VAT for your product please refer to the Seller Education Hub（https://seller.shopee.com.co/edu/article/13565）

query.name: model_sku
query.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

query.name: seller_stock
query.description: new stock info（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

query.name: location_id
query.description: location id, you can get the location id from v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail api, if seller don't have any warehouse, you don't need to upload this field.

query.name: stock
query.description: stock

query.name: gtin_code
query.description: - GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1. - They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN. - GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook. - That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing. Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00". The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API - Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number. - Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN. - Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

query.name: weight
query.description: The weight of this model, the unit is KG. If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default. If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

query.name: dimension
query.description: The dimension of this model. If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

query.name: package_height
query.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_length
query.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

query.name: package_width
query.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

query.name: pre_order
query.description: Pre-order information of this model. Notes: If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

query.name: is_pre_order
query.description: Whether the model is pre order.

query.name: days_to_ship
query.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_dts_limit API.

query.name: standardise_tier_variation
query.description: There is at least one standardise_tier_variation and tier_variation. If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

query.name: variation_id
query.description: standardise tier variation ID

query.name: variation_name
query.description: standardise tier variation name

query.name: variation_group_id
query.description: standardise tier variation group ID

query.name: variation_option_list
query.description: standardise tier variation option list

query.name: variation_option_id
query.description: standardise tier variation option ID

query.name: variation_option_name
query.description: standardise tier variation option value

query.name: image_id
query.description: standardise tier variation option image ID

request_examples.code:
<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://partner.shopeemobile.com/api/v2/product/init_tier_variation?access_token=access_token&partner_id=partner_id&shop_id=shop_id&sign=sign&timestamp=timestamp',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_ENCODING => '',
  CURLOPT_MAXREDIRS => 10,
  CURLOPT_TIMEOUT => 0,
  CURLOPT_FOLLOWLOCATION => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTP_VERSION => CURL_HTTP_VERSION_1_1,
  CURLOPT_CUSTOMREQUEST => 'POST',
  CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS => '{
    "model": [
        {
            "gtin_code": "-",
            "model_sku": "SKU",
            "original_price": 38.3,
            "seller_stock": [
                {
                    "location_id": "-",
                    "stock": 0
                }
            ],
            "weight": 1.1
        }
    ],
    "standardise_tier_variation": [
        {
            "variation_group_id": 2,
            "variation_id": 1,
            "variation_name": "name1",
            "variation_option_list": [
                {
                    "image_id": "82becb4830bd2ee90ad6acf8a9dc26d7",
                    "variation_option_id": 0,
                    "variation_option_name": "option2"
                }
            ]
        }
    ],
    "tier_variation": [
        {
            "name": "Color",
            "option_list": [
                {
                    "image": {
                        "image_id": "82becb4830bd2ee90ad6acf8a9dc26d7"
                    },
                    "option": "Red"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}',
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'Content-Type: application/json'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);

curl_close($curl);
echo $response;

schema.name: error
schema.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: message
schema.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

schema.name: request_id
schema.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

schema.name: tier_index
schema.description: Tier index of model. Index starts from 0.

schema.name: weight
schema.description: The weight of this model, the unit is KG. If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default. If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

schema.name: dimension
schema.description: The dimension of this model. If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

schema.name: package_height
schema.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_length
schema.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

schema.name: package_width
schema.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.
